issue.title: [Documentation] Move integration testing documentation to Sphinx docs, add instructions for JavaScript
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-5405](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5405). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
I noticed that JavaScript information is not in integration/README.md. It would be a good opportunity to migrate over this to the docs/source/developers directory

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5405?focusedCommentId=17032611) by Neal Richardson (npr):*
I'm doing this in ARROW-5563
